languages.text:
{n}Идира застывает, явно к чему-то прислушиваясь. А затем резко, не своим голосом выпаливает:{/n} "Первый зверь, раненый, приполз в нору под дворцом высокого господина. Второй зверь, изъязвленный, сгинул в астероидной могиле.
Третий зверь, проклятый, свернулся в сиянии желтого светила..."

{n}Idira freezes, listening to something. Then she blurts out in a changed voice,{/n} "The first beast, its body wounded, crawled into a hole under the palace of an eminent lord. The second beast, its skin in ulcers, perished in an asteroid grave.
The third beast, its essence cursed, is curled up in the glow of a yellow sun..."
languages.original_text:

Третий зверь, проклятый, свернулся в сиянии желтого светила..."

{n}Idira freezes, listening to something. Then she blurts out in a changed voice,{/n} "The first beast, its body wounded, crawled into a hole under the palace of an eminent lord. The second beast, its skin in ulcers, perished in an asteroid grave.
The third beast, its essence cursed, is curled up in the glow of a yellow sun..."

languages.text:
{n}イディラは固まり、何かに耳を傾けている。突然、上ずった声で話し始めた。{/n}「一匹目の獣は身体を傷つけられ、高名な領主の宮廷の地下の穴に潜り込んだ。二匹目の獣は皮膚に潰瘍ができ、小惑星の墓場で死にたえた。
三匹目の獣は本質から呪われ、黄色い太陽の光の中で丸まっている…」
languages.original_text:
{n}Idira freezes, listening to something. Then she blurts out in a changed voice,{/n} "The first beast, its body wounded, crawled into a hole under the palace of an eminent lord. The second beast, its skin in ulcers, perished in an asteroid grave.
The third beast, its essence cursed, is curled up in the glow of a yellow sun..."

traits.locale_text:
{n}イディラは固まり、何かに耳を傾けている。突然、上ずった声で話し始めた。{/n}「一匹目の獣は身体を傷つけられ、高名な領主の宮廷の地下の穴に潜り込んだ。二匹目の獣は皮膚に潰瘍ができ、小惑星の墓場で死にたえた。
三匹目の獣は本質から呪われ、黄色い太陽の光の中で丸まっている…」

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉僵在原地，像是在听着什么，随后以截然不同的声音开了口。{/n}“第一头野兽，身负重伤，爬进了高贵领主宫殿之下的洞里。第二头野兽，皮肤溃烂，死在了小行星的坟墓之中。第三头野兽，遭到诅咒，蜷缩在黄色太阳的光芒之下……”
languages.original_text:
{n}Idira freezes, listening to something. Then she blurts out in a changed voice,{/n} "The first beast, its body wounded, crawled into a hole under the palace of an eminent lord. The second beast, its skin in ulcers, perished in an asteroid grave.
The third beast, its essence cursed, is curled up in the glow of a yellow sun..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉僵在原地，像是在听着什么，随后以截然不同的声音开了口。{/n}“第一头野兽，身负重伤，爬进了高贵领主宫殿之下的洞里。第二头野兽，皮肤溃烂，死在了小行星的坟墓之中。第三头野兽，遭到诅咒，蜷缩在黄色太阳的光芒之下……”

languages.text:
{n}Idira se queda inmóvil escuchando algo. Cuando termina, espeta con voz cambiada:{/n} «La primera bestia, con el cuerpo herido, se arrastró hasta un agujero bajo el palacio de un eminente señor. La segunda, con la piel llena de úlceras, pereció en un asteroide que le dio sepultura.
La tercera bestia, con su esencia maldita, se acurrucó en el resplandor de un sol amarillo...».
languages.original_text:
{n}Idira freezes, listening to something. Then she blurts out in a changed voice,{/n} "The first beast, its body wounded, crawled into a hole under the palace of an eminent lord. The second beast, its skin in ulcers, perished in an asteroid grave.
The third beast, its essence cursed, is curled up in the glow of a yellow sun..."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Idira se queda inmóvil escuchando algo. Cuando termina, espeta con voz cambiada:{/n} «La primera bestia, con el cuerpo herido, se arrastró hasta un agujero bajo el palacio de un eminente señor. La segunda, con la piel llena de úlceras, pereció en un asteroide que le dio sepultura.
La tercera bestia, con su esencia maldita, se acurrucó en el resplandor de un sol amarillo...».

languages.text:
{n}Idira se fige, écoutant quelque chose, puis s'exclame d'une voix étrange :{/n} « La première créature, le corps blessé, s'est réfugiée dans un trou sous le palais d'un éminent seigneur. La deuxième, la peau recouverte de lésions, a péri dans le tombeau d'un astéroïde.
Quant à la troisième, dont l'essence est maudite, elle est recroquevillée sous la lueur d'un soleil jaune... »
languages.original_text:
{n}Idira freezes, listening to something. Then she blurts out in a changed voice,{/n} "The first beast, its body wounded, crawled into a hole under the palace of an eminent lord. The second beast, its skin in ulcers, perished in an asteroid grave.
The third beast, its essence cursed, is curled up in the glow of a yellow sun..."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Idira se fige, écoutant quelque chose, puis s'exclame d'une voix étrange :{/n} « La première créature, le corps blessé, s'est réfugiée dans un trou sous le palais d'un éminent seigneur. La deuxième, la peau recouverte de lésions, a péri dans le tombeau d'un astéroïde.
Quant à la troisième, dont l'essence est maudite, elle est recroquevillée sous la lueur d'un soleil jaune... »

languages.text:
{n}Idira erstarrt und lauscht. Dann bricht es aus ihr mit veränderter Stimme heraus:{/n} "Die erste Bestie kroch mit verwundetem Körper in ein Loch unter den Palast eines geschätzten Lords. Die zweite Bestie, die Haut voller Geschwüre, verging in einem Asteroidengrab.
Die dritte Bestie ist mit verfluchter Essenz eingerollt in das Leuchten einer gelben Sonne ..."
languages.original_text:
{n}Idira freezes, listening to something. Then she blurts out in a changed voice,{/n} "The first beast, its body wounded, crawled into a hole under the palace of an eminent lord. The second beast, its skin in ulcers, perished in an asteroid grave.
The third beast, its essence cursed, is curled up in the glow of a yellow sun..."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Idira erstarrt und lauscht. Dann bricht es aus ihr mit veränderter Stimme heraus:{/n} "Die erste Bestie kroch mit verwundetem Körper in ein Loch unter den Palast eines geschätzten Lords. Die zweite Bestie, die Haut voller Geschwüre, verging in einem Asteroidengrab.
Die dritte Bestie ist mit verfluchter Essenz eingerollt in das Leuchten einer gelben Sonne ..."

languages.text:
{n}Bir şeye kulak kabartan İdira donup kalıyor. Sonra farklı bir ses tonuyla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "İlk canavarın bedeni yaralı, yüce bir lordun sarayının altındaki bir deliğe sığınmış. İkinci canavarın cildi çıban dolu, bir asteroit mezarında son nefesini vermiş.
Üçüncü canavar özünden lanetlenmiş, sarı bir güneşin ışınları altında kıvrılmış yatıyor..."
languages.original_text:
{n}Idira freezes, listening to something. Then she blurts out in a changed voice,{/n} "The first beast, its body wounded, crawled into a hole under the palace of an eminent lord. The second beast, its skin in ulcers, perished in an asteroid grave.
The third beast, its essence cursed, is curled up in the glow of a yellow sun..."

traits.locale_text:
{n}İdira bir şeye kulak kabarttığı için donup kalıyor. Sonra farklı bir ses tonuyla şunları söylüyor:{/n} "İlk canavarın bedeni yaralı, yüce bir lordun sarayının altındaki bir deliğe sığınmış. İkinci canavarın cildi çıbanlarla dolmuş, bir astreoid mezarında son nefesini vermiş.
Üçüncü canavar özünden lanetlenmiş, sarı bir güneşin ışınları altında kıvrılmış yatıyor..."
